text: Nɨ e ateghtɨ, e nɨn damazimɨn mɨtiriamɨn aremeghan kogham. Eghtɨ en nguazim pura ikɨ ikuvighan kogham. Kamaghɨn, atrivim dagheba e danɨngtɨ, e an ingangarir gumazamizir kɨnibar mɨn ikiam. Eghtɨ atrivim uaghan en nguazim iniam. Kamaghɨn, e uari, nɨ oparir dagher ovɨziba e danɨng, eghtɨ e deragh ikɨva ovengan koghtɨ, en nguazim ikuvighan kogham.”
